title: Almond raspberry cake
ingredients: ['125g fresh raspberries', '3 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '125g plain flour', '65g caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 pinch salt', '125ml soured cream', '30g butter, melted', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 egg', '25g flaked almonds', 'For the glaze', '4 tablespoons icing sugar', '1 teaspoon milk', '1 drop vanilla extract']
